wikipedia_page.main: David Robert Bates (born 5 October 1996) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a defender for Aberdeen. Bates has previously played for Raith Rovers, East Stirlingshire, Brechin City, Rangers, Hamburg, Cercle Brugge and Sheffield Wednesday. He has been capped four times at full international level by the Scotland national team.
